text: phu thi khea pen phu phakdi nı yam khakhun nı sphaph khxng phu suyu d læa phu yun lahmad doythi khea hwan kerng tx lok xa khi reaa hˌ læa hwang khwam metta khxng phracea khxng khea (ca hemuxnkab phu thi tang pha khi tx xallxhˌ kranan hrux?) Cng klaw theid(muhammad) brrda phu ru læa brrda phu miru ca theatheiym kan hrux? Thæcring brrda phu mi stipayya theanan thi ca khırkhrwy
